articles.author: Chloe Taylor, Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: European markets lower as positive sentiment vanishes - CNBC
articles.description: European markets were trading in negative territory Tuesday as investors geared up for the latest U.S. inflation report this week.
articles.content:
German insurer Allianz lifted its financial targets on Tuesday, ahead of its 2024 Capital Markets Day in Munich.
The company pledged to return more money to its shareholders, aiming to boost earning… [+483 chars]

articles.author: Tom Westbrook, Alun John
articles.title: China stocks jump on Politburo policy shift; Aussie falls after RBA - Reuters
articles.description: European equities dipped on Tuesday, taking cues from tech-led declines on Wall Street rather than building on stimulus-fueled gains in China, while the Australian dollar slid as the central bank suggested rate cuts were finally approaching.

articles.title: European satellites launched to create an artificial eclipse - Salon
articles.description: The European Space Agency billed the event as a tech demo
